name: KAOLIN MUSHROOM FARMS, INC., Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA LABOR RELATIONS BOARD, Appellee. Union De Trabajadores De Kaolin, a/k/a Kaolin Workers Union, Intervenor
name_abbreviation: Kaolin Mushroom Farms, Inc. v. Pennsylvania Labor Relations Board

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: KAOLIN MUSHROOM FARMS, INC., Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA LABOR RELATIONS BOARD, Appellee. Union De Trabajadores De Kaolin, a/k/a Kaolin Workers Union, Intervenor.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Brian F. Jackson, Harrisburg, for Kaolin Mushroom Farms, Inc.
D. Michael Fisher, Atty. Gen., for Com.
James L. Crawford, Chief Counsel, Peter Lassi, Asst. Counsel, for Labor Relations Bd.
Sam Spear, Philadelphia, Arthur N. Reed, for Kaolin Workers Union.
casebody.head_matter:
720 A.2d 763
KAOLIN MUSHROOM FARMS, INC., Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA LABOR RELATIONS BOARD, Appellee. Union De Trabajadores De Kaolin, a/k/a Kaolin Workers Union, Intervenor.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Nov. 16, 1998.
Decided Dec. 14, 1998.
Brian F. Jackson, Harrisburg, for Kaolin Mushroom Farms, Inc.
D. Michael Fisher, Atty. Gen., for Com.
James L. Crawford, Chief Counsel, Peter Lassi, Asst. Counsel, for Labor Relations Bd.
Sam Spear, Philadelphia, Arthur N. Reed, for Kaolin Workers Union.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
